result.reason: Enhancement to allow connections to act as containers/folders for other connections, requiring architectural updates to the connection model and tree view logic.
result.approach: Investigate allowing ConnectionInfo objects to maintain a list of child connections and update the TreeView to support rendering/expanding connection nodes as parents.
